name: Shinobi Showdown (JordanBaltich)
description:
Up to 4 player competitive party game.

Grapple and swing around the map to throw kunai and take out the competition.

See who is the ultimate shinobi! 

3 Modes:

Stock , Time, and Bomb

*Currently Only has support for Xbox Controllers* (sorry)

*At least 2 players needed to start a game*

A project by Jordan Baltich & Nolan Grant.
